short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect sudoku puzzle from screen and suggest next steps to solve the sudoku puzzle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sudoku Helper is a Chrome extension that helps you solve Sudoku puzzles by providing hints and reasoning.
When you're stuck on a Sudoku puzzle, Sudoku Helper can analyze the grid and suggest possible next steps, along with explanations for why those steps might be helpful.
With Sudoku Helper, you can learn new Sudoku solving techniques and improve your Sudoku skills over time.
